newsitem.title: USA: Linens 'n Things to open 20-25 superstores.
newsitem.headline: Linens 'n Things to open 20-25 superstores.

text.p: Linens 'n Things Inc said on Tuesday that the expansion of its superstore concept remains on track, and it expects to open 20-25 superstores in 1997.
The company defines superstores as stores averaging about 35,000 square feet in size, in contrast to traditional stores which average 7,000 to 10,000 square feet.
Linens 'n Things opened a total of 36 superstores in 1996, and is currently operating 169 stores in 34 states.
